item.title: August 2023 Update
item.description: Lots of great progress on the new SF3 body this month. Things started strong by finishing the top carving over the course of a few days. This is a spot I was a bit stuck on mentally as there are so many different ways to go about it, but in the end I think it turned out pretty well. Check out the close to final version below. Chambered Claro Walnut SF3 Carve Top Guitar Sorry, your browser doesn't support embedded videos.
